font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 获取，获得： to get as one’s own
【例】 bacteria that acquire tolerance to antibiotics 产生了抗药性的细菌‖I have never acquired a taste for wine. 我从来就不具备对葡萄酒酒的品味能力。
【近】 attain, capture, draw, gain, garner, get, make, obtain, procure, realize, reap, secure, win, bring in
【反】 forfeit, lose 丧失
